these examples are *really* helpful. I have only been doing unit testing
(for each class) for a few months. and trying to figure out how to organize
the directory structures in cvs and ant to facilitate the different levels
of testing is still a puzzle (reading ant in anger ant java tools for xp).
So please keep the examples coming!

thanks
